headline.main: EVENTS OF INTEREST IN SHIPPING WORLD; Four Captains Appointed to New Commands on Craft of the Grace Line

lead_paragraph: The Grace Line announced yesterday the appointment of four captains to new commands and the promotion of Captain A.E. Uldall, chief officer of the freighter Santa Ana, to command the steamship Falcon.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: NORWEGIAN SEAMEN'S CHRISTMAS AND RELIEF INC
